dcterms:creator: Amir Shahroudy
Jun Liu

dcterms:description: A popular resource for recognizing human actions based on skeletons, consisting of 56,880 sequences of actions with two evaluation benchmarks: Cross-Subject and Cross-View.
dcterms:title: NTU RGB+D

dcterms:creator: Jun Liu
Amir Shahroudy
Mauricio Perez
Gang Wang
Ling-Yu Duan
Alex C Kot
dcterms:description: An extended version of the NTU RGB+D dataset, containing an additional 57,367 skeleton sequences across 60 additional action classes, totaling 120 action classes.
dcterms:title: NTU RGB+D 120
